DOC.brief_summary: The study compares the short-term tinnitus reduction following a single oxytocin intervention with a placebo control condition.
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects of Oxytocin Nasal Spray on Chronic Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: chronic tinnitus with a duration > 6 months medical examination by an ENT specialist sufficient knowledge of the Portuguese language to follow the instructions and answer the questionnaires VAS score >4 points vascular tinnitus muscular tinnitus conductive hearing loss previous experience with oxytocin nasal spray additional medications during the intervention
